Title: We're Hiring Startup Ambassadors!
Post summary: Pieces is hiring highly-motivated CEC students to become Startup Ambassadors for our product. Is that you?
FullPost:
Pieces Startup Ambassador

Remote

Apply Here

Are you passionate about technology and startups? Do you geek out about tools that make your life easier as a developer? Do you want to bring new opportunities to your university and your peers? Do your friends say you're a natural leader? Do you want to make some extra money while getting a startup experience?  If so, the Pieces Startup Ambassador Program may be perfect for you!

As a Pieces Startup Ambassador, you‚Äôll become a liaison between Pieces and your university. Ambassadors evangelize Pieces by planning, hosting and attending events during the school semester, introducing students and professors to new Pieces features and acting as a campus contact for the Pieces team.

Pieces is a venture-backed 25 person startup with a first-of-its-kind productivity platform that enables professional creators - developers and designers initially - to save, store and share code snippets, links, raw text, screenshots, images, design layers and more with a simple copy and paste or right-click.  Pieces is headquartered in the OTR neighborhood in Cincinnati, Ohio, with team members in San Francisco, Canada, Ireland, Spain, Poland and India.

This role can be based at any university in the US.

About the Program

What you‚Äôll do:

  • Be an advocate for and source of knowledge of Pieces and our tool on your campus
  • Attend semi-regular check-ins with the Pieces marketing team to set and track progress against goals for your campus
  • Create events, activities and opportunities that showcase the benefits of Pieces and its features
  • Give demos and/or presentations on how Pieces to university students, clubs and professors
  • Publish digital content in relation to Pieces to campus forums, group chats & social media sites.
  • Collect feedback from students through focus groups, surveys and individual interviews    and relay findings to the Pieces team
  • Distribute flyers and other promotional materials across your campus
  • Help Pieces understand your universities‚Äô culture

What we‚Äôre looking for:

Must-Haves:

  • Be an enrolled student at an accredited University in the U.S
  • Availability to work a maximum of five hours per week for your university‚Äôs Spring 2022 semester
  • Strong communication skills, a ‚Äúcan-do‚Äù attitude
  • Excellent organization skills and an eye for detail
  • Active involvement in student life on campus and online  

Nice-to-Haves:

  • Pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Software Development, Information Technology or related field
  • A passion for coding, software development and developer tools üôÇ
  • Experience with planning and executing events, managing budgets
  • Experience with creating promotional materials using design software such as Canva, Adobe Suite    

Benefits

  • Compensation: $18/hour
  • Real-world startup experience working on developer tools and field marketing
  • Enhance professional development, leadership, technical & communication skills
  • Add the Pieces Ambassador Program experience to your resum√©
  • Inside access to getting a full-stack developer internship at Pieces
  • Career coaching session with Pieces founders

Application Timeline

  • Students who wish to be considered for this program will be expected to complete and submit this form. Applications are rolling!
Author: Abby Connaughton
